mapper.select: select a.*, (select count(auction_no) from bid where user_email = #{email}) as bid_cnt, RANK() OVER (ORDER BY a.auction_limit_date ) as rk from auction a inner join bid b on a.auction_no = b.auction_no where b.user_email = #{email}
mapper.insert: insert into user(user_email, user_pass, user_phnum, user_nickname ) values (#{userEmail}, #{userPass},#{userPhnum},#{userNickname});
